body:
Howdy there!

T.U.R.D.S. Team of Unified Retired and Decisive Staff

T.U.R.D.S. is a group of retired staff members who wish to unite and voice our opinions as a group. We will be posting our group opinions on certain topics rather than running around the forums as individuals and spamming topics on avicus related work.

Current Members
Zac
Michael
Iron
Howsie
MidnightBeats
Lance2000XD
Mango_
glitchy1
MerlinMaster
Steven5703
Colecrc
PieZ
NolanDalton
Sayah

Contact myself for info regarding T.U.R.D.S.

replies.body:
The Rebel of Retireds
On May 2016 year Retireds overthrew Avicus Administrators, established dictatorship and plunged server into chaos. Every Old Staff Member was demoted and banned forever, Forums fell under onsluaght of Spam and Swearing, TeamSpeak was devasted by Trolls and closed. All maps became red and black 'cause of blood and darkness enveloped Avicus. And Avicus was renamed into Suciva.

Dori me
Interimo adapare dori me
Ameno ameno latire
Latiremo
Dori me

Ameno
Omenare imperavi ameno
Dimere dimere matiro
Matiremo
Ameno

replies.body: We also held a vote among staff members when I was mod in which we voted on whether lance was retired or demoted. The vote was unanimous except for those who withheld their votes. replies.body:
He did not get demoted from staff, when he exited the team he was given retired until that rank was later taken from him. As he was judged as deserving if the rank and had it removed we choose to refute the decision and will continue to do so. As you are not retired, leave this to the experts. :)

A demeaning saying in calling something cute and gender slandering statement, your insults are on a 5th grade level and have 0 relevance to the actual events. It feels as though you lack the intelligence to actually create your own, or at least somewhat cohesive insults. Judging from the picture you posted you might be suffering from a level of autism. Do you get bullied in school and then take your anger out by repeating insults created by your 5th grade tormentors and unleashing them on the forums? If so don't worry. I'm here for you.
